titleStmt.title: The great idol of the masse overthrown in 24 arguments wherein the doctrine of transubstantiation is fully refuted in a sermon preached upon Luke 22 the latter part of the 19th verse / by a Protestant.
titleStmt.author: Protestant.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: print showthrough with slight loss of print.
